thread.title: Collins Barrow Partner helps not-for-profits understand best practices
thread.title_full: Collins Barrow Partner helps not-for-profits understand best practices - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Collins Barrow Partner helps not-for-profits understand best practices
text:
Collins Barrow National Cooperative Incorporated
COURTICE, ON , Oct. 5, 2015 /CNW/ - Collins Barrow Durham partner Laura Wilson will be speaking at the Clarington Board of Trade on October 6 , along with industry expert Anna Naud from Mason Bennett Johncox Professional Corporation. From 7:30am until 9am , Laura and Anna will offer an overview of the current landscape for not-for-profits under the existing Ontario Corporations Act and the newly implemented Canada Not-for-profit Corporations Act (CNCA).
During the presentation, they will share their insight on basic governance structures and best practices for not-for-profits. "Our clients have asked for clarity on these issues," said Laura. "The comprehensive review of up-to-date legal, financial, and tax compliance requirements that we provide will help engineer greater value for these organizations."
